fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value:
Gain 1 **Happy** 😃  while spending all the **Money** 💵 you have on 1$ shades 🕶️ while you start to get **Slick**.
- Lose 1 **Happy**, your shades, and your **Slick**ness when something negative happens to you. It just wouldn't be cool.

fields.name: - Flipped ( <:magenta:1106716255966220319> + <:slightlylightergreenbutwithalitt:1120008660454744117> ):
fields.value:
Gain 2 **Happy** and 3 💵 from selling cool shades while you get **Slick**.
- With your shades business, you draw an **Ethereal** Grease Up (1933).
